author: hansbak
msg: remove the old ofbiz website from within cmssite, add a dutch and thai version of the official ofbiz website as a new component in special purpose currently in use as http://ofbiz.nl, http://ofbiz.be and http://ofbiz.in.th, mount this website as the root, Obviously he english version needs to be added and a link to the demoshop (ecommerce component) and a link to the backend myportal. Erwan can now add his french version by simply supplying a patch to the trunk, another contribution of Antwebsystems.com, this time employee 'Tor'
